title: Crypto Super PAC Fairshake Raised $6.8 Million From Winklevoss Twins and VCs in January
description: The super PAC's other January donors included VC firms Electric Capital and Blockchain Capital, according to a Federal Election Commission report.

title: Circle Axes Support for USDC on Tron, Citing 'Risk Management'
description: The stablecoin issuer said that its decision, "aligns with our efforts to ensure that USDC remains trusted, transparent and safe."

title: Bitcoin exchange balance dips to lowest since 2018 as market shifts to HODLing
description:
Since mid-March 2020, there has been a notable decline in the volume of Bitcoin stored in exchange wallets, marking a significant shift in investor behavior. At the time, over 17% of Bitcoin’s total supply was housed on exchanges, a record high. This trend of declining exchange balances has continued unabated, even through Bitcoin’s 2021 bull run, […]

The post Bitcoin exchange balance dips to lowest since 2018 as market shifts to HODLing appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: GameFi community pleads for regulatory relief in Japan
description: Representatives from Japan‘s burgeoning blockchain gaming community have approached the Liberal Democratic Party (LDP) with urgent concerns regarding liquidity in the country’s crypto asset market.  The move comes amidst fears that stringent regulations are stifling growth and hampering the flourishing GameFi ecosystem. description: In a significant development in the political landscape of Massachusetts, pro-crypto lawyer John Deaton has officially announced his intention to challenge Senator Elizabeth Warren in the upcoming senate election.
